result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Filed by DA's Office. km

BOND ON FILE.

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Sarah Bursack. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- Defendant is allowed to contact law enforcement to determine if victim is at residence. 

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

2:18 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Erica Ellenwood and Intern Ali Casey in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson in court for today for Cory Steven MacDonald. Defendant Cory Steven MacDonald in court. DE does not qualify for public defender, PFAC provided. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. NG. State requests bond. Atty. Harrelson makes bond argument. Court sets bond. Court sets STC for attorney status, SETC and PSC. Adjourned: 2:25 PM. kma
